Uses of Class
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.cloudlets.network.NetworkCloudlet

  • Packages that use NetworkCloudlet 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.cloudlets.network
    Provides network-enabled Cloudlet implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.schedulers.cloudlet.network
    Provides network-enabled CloudletScheduler implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.network
    Provides network-enabled Vm implementations.

    • Uses of NetworkCloudlet in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.cloudlets.network

      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.cloudlets.network that return NetworkCloudlet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NetworkCloudlet NetworkCloudlet.addTask(CloudletTask task)
      Adds a task to the task list and links the task to the NetworkCloudlet.
      NetworkCloudlet CloudletTask.getCloudlet()
      Gets the NetworkCloudlet that the task belongs to.
      NetworkCloudlet NetworkCloudlet.setMemory(long memory)
      Sets the Cloudlet's RAM memory.
      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.cloudlets.network with parameters of type NetworkCloudlet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CloudletTask.setCloudlet(NetworkCloudlet cloudlet) 

    • Uses of NetworkCloudlet in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.schedulers.cloudlet.network

      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.schedulers.cloudlet.network with parameters of type NetworkCloudlet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void NetworkCloudletSpaceSharedScheduler.addPacketsToBeSentFromVm(NetworkCloudlet sourceCloudlet)
      Gets the list of packets to be sent from a given source cloudlet and adds this list to the list of all packets to send from the VM hosting that cloudlet.
      protected void NetworkCloudletSpaceSharedScheduler.receivePackets(NetworkCloudlet sourceCloudlet)
      Check for packets to be received by a given cloudlet and deliver them to it.
